overview: Imagine that love disappears from our lives, the color red becomes forbidden, romantic songs are rejected, imagine on Valentine’s Day February 14, there is no “teddy bear” in the streets, but whoever buys or carries it gets arrested, and the state uses the media to control the minds of citizens through the radio announcer Hassan, who was once a romantic poet, is now the person who tries to make people forget Valentine's Day.
title: National Day of Mourning in Mexico
